text: Evans Mensah (born 9 February 1998) is a Ghanaian footballer who plays as a winger for Al-Kharaitiyat on loan from Al-Duhail. ==Early life and youth== Born in Agona Swedru and raised in Ghana, Evans Mensah joined Right to Dream Academy after being scouted as a prodigious talent at an Academy event. ==Club career== Mensah was loaned to HJK in Finland after a successful medical analysis, making his Veikkausliiga debut for HJK in 3–2 loss to Inter Turku, coming on as substitute in the 90th minute, on 16 September 2016. ==International career== Called up to the Ghana national football team as a replacement for David Accam, who was injured, Mensah made his international debut against Mozambique in a 2017 Africa Cup of Nations qualifier. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {|
